name: Miragem - Part B
description:
WELCOME TO THE WORLD OF MIRAGEM

Miragem is a timed collectathon adventure through the Valley of Lost Dreams. It mixes the collectathon exploration of a Banjo Kazooie stage with the time dynamic of the game Minit. ⠀ 

You start in the Hub, a safe zone in the Valley. But once outside you're against the clock. Subjected to a magic that puts all to sleep once the timer reaches zero, you have limited time before being sent back to the Hub. So to be able to explore the valley, you must collect items that increase that exploration time; allowing you to go further into the Valley, unlock shortcuts and new areas, and progressively discover more of the story. ⠀ 

This was our approach to bringing something new into the genre. Being able to explore everything is not a given like in other 3D Platformers, but something the player must earn. The more you want to advance, the more you have to collect. That way the act of collecting gets a lot more meaningful.

In this segment you be able to explore one of the four areas of the game!
